backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Student type with CRUD operations (add, get, update, getAllStudents) and comparison functions for sorting by name, email, or UID.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: React form for adding students, student list with edit functionality, no authentication, and warm educational theme design.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing components for student management, custom React Query hooks, and styling with warm educational color palette.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color format with warm educational color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Student Data Management Website.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component with header, footer with social links, and two-column layout displaying StudentForm and StudentList components.
Modal dialog component for editing student records with form validation, read-only UID field, and integration with useUpdateStudent mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/StudentForm.tsx: Card-based form component for adding new students with name, email, and UID fields, including validation and toast notifications using useAddStudent mutation.
frontend/src/components/StudentList.tsx: Displays all student records in card layout with edit buttons, handles loading/error/empty states, and manages StudentEditForm dialog visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor using React Query, automatically recreating the actor when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for student CRUD operations including useGetAllStudents, useAddStudent, and useUpdateStudent, with automatic cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm educational color palette (terracotta and sage green) for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors mapped to CSS variables, custom fonts (Inter, JetBrains Mono), shadows, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking a student data management website with public access, defining existing features (React frontend with forms, student list display, warm educational theme) and pending backend implementation tasks.
